summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the account of Cynthia Rodriguez for the month of January 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting significant transactions such as a $3,000,000 transfer.

keyFacts: Cynthia Rodriguez is the account holder for the Deutsche Bank account detailed in the statement.
The account had a beginning balance of $36,094,966.11 as of January 1, 2018.
A significant transaction of $3,000,000 was transferred out of the account on January 12, 2018.
The account earned an interest payment of $6,100.09 by the end of January 2018.
The document contains confidential information and is subject to legal protections.
